greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A008683(n)*A014197(n) where A008683 is the Moebius (or Mobius) function mu(n) and A014197 is the number of numbers m with Euler phi(m) = n.
comment: For n < 93 and a(n) not 0, n = p - 1 where p is prime and therefore in A077064 (Squarefree numbers of form prime - 1.)
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: A014197(n, m=1) = { n==1 && return(1+(m<2)); my(p, q); sumdiv(n, d, if( d>=m && isprime(d+1), sum( i=0, valuation(q=n\d, p=d+1), A014197(q\p^i, p))))} \\ This function from _M. F. Hasler_, Oct 05 2009
results.author: _Gerald McGarvey_, Sep 04 2004
